data.message: Couldn't secure tickets for Ed's recent tour, gutted. Anyone I know who was there said he was fabulous. I hope I'm lucky here. I tried and tried last year for UP CLOSE with JUSTIN TIMBERLAKE tickets at the Indigo O2 in association with Coca-Cola and Capital FM. I also spent a small fortune entering every possible time (several times a day) via my phone on Capital FM. My two musical favorites. The excitement every time I entered only followed by huge disappointment. I'll try and try and try.

replies.message: Hi Patricia, can you please send us a private message as we might have something for you ;)
OMG, I have just messaged you. Fingers crossed and hopeful!
